term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - molecular conformation of a polymer
term.title: molecular conformation

item.text: The conformation of the macromolecule as a whole. In the polymer literature, molecular conformation is sometimes referred to as macroconformation. In molecular conformations involving parallel stems, the latter may be confined to the same crystal or may also extend over several crystals.
